Package nzilbb.ag

Class Schema

  • Object
    • Schema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, CloneableBean
    public class Schema
extends Object
implements Cloneable, CloneableBean
    Definition of layers and their interrelations.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz

        turnLayerId - ID of the layer that contains speaker turns.

        episodeLayerId - ID of the layer that tags the graph with its episode name, if any.

      • addLayer

        public Layer addLayer​(Layer layer)
        Adds a layer.

        If the given layer was already in the schema, the original definition is not replaced.

        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to add.
        Returns:
        The layer in the schema - the given layer if it was not already in the schema, or the original layer object, if it was already in the schema.

      • getLayer

        public Layer getLayer​(String id)
        Gets the named layer.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the desired layer.
        Returns:
        The named layer, or null if it's not in the schema.

      • getMatchingLayers

        public Layer[] getMatchingLayers​(String expression)
                          throws ScriptException
        Returns layers that match the given expression.

        The expression is evaluated as a JavaScript boolean expressin and can assume that layer is a reference to a candidate layer and schema is a reference to this schema.

        e.g. layer.parentId == schema.participantLayerId && layer.alignment == 0 should match all un-aligned children of the participant layer; i.e. participant attributes.

        Parameters:
        expression - A Javascript boolean expression to use to filter layers.
        Returns:
        A list of matching layers, which may be empty.
        Throws:
        ScriptException

      • copyLayerIdsFrom

        public Schema copyLayerIdsFrom​(Schema source)
        Copies the IDs of the special layers identified by the given schema.
        Parameters:
        source - The source schema.
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
